mapper.select: SELECT A.id as appt_id, A.date as appt_date, A.time as appt_time, P.id as patient_id, P.name as patient_name, P.address as patient_address, P.phoneNumber as patient_number, D.name as doc_name, D.employeeId as doc_id, D.position as doc_position, Dep.id as dep_id, Dep.name as dep_name, N.name as nur_name, N.employeeId as nur_id, N.position as nur_position FROM Appointment A JOIN Patient P ON A.Patient_id = P.id JOIN Doctor D ON A.Doctor_employeeId = D.employeeId JOIN Nurse N ON A.Nurse_employeeID = N.employeeId JOIN Departments Dep ON D.Departments_id = Dep.id OR N.Departments_id = Dep.id WHERE A.id= #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE Appointment SET date=#{date}, time=#{time} WHERE id=#{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Appointment (date, time, Patient_id, Doctor_employeeId, Nurse_employeeId, id) VALUES (#{date},#{time},#{patient.id}, #{doctor.id}, #{nurse.id}, #{id})
